page.title: 03FARMING CONTINUED
page.content: FARMING concentrates on dairying, heifer rearing & arable crops. The {LIVESTOCK}consists of 200 pedigree Friesian cows,a decrease of 50 due to E.E.C. cutbacks.Each cow produces approx.1400 galls of milk annually with 4% butter fat content.30 cows yield 50 tonnes of milk annually & in 1983 won the N.M.R.competition.The milk is supplied to Express Dairies. For{MACHINERY}there are 6 tractors mainly Deere & 1 combine harvester, there are several ploughs , mowers sprayers, feeders , foragers, 3 trailers & a heavy scrapper.There is also a 265000 gall slurry store with bubbler & a low lying herringbone parlour.One of the major CROPS was Watercress on the R.Gade but it has all but disappeared.There is little vandalism & footpaths are well maintained .
